title: Travel distance does not exceed that mentioned in sub regulation (3)(ii)(i)(i&ii)of regulation 47 an
clause_text: Travel distance does not exceed that mentioned in sub regulation (3)(ii)(i)(i&ii)of regulation 47 and; If floor area on any floor does not exceeds 500 sq. m Note: These staircases shall be of enclosed type having minimum width of 1.5m.
